casebody.data:
William PATTY et al.
v.
PLANNING AND ZONING COMMISSION OF the TOWN OF WILTON et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided May 8, 2019 Paul A. Sobel, in support of the petition. Matthew C. Mason, Barbara Schellenberg and Patricia C. Sullivan, in opposition.

The plaintiffs' petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 188 Conn. App. 115 , 203 A.3d 1248 (2019), is denied.
